text: Allah e vyakti edalo kuda rendu hrdayalu pettaledu. Mariyu miru mi bharyalanu'tallulu' ani paliki, jihar cesinantatane varini miku talluluga ceyaledu. Mariyu miru datta tisukonna varini mi (kanna) kumaruluga ceyaledu. Ivanni miru mi notito palike matalu matrame! Mariyu allah satyam palukutadu mariyu ayana (rju) margam vaipunaku margadarsakatvam cestadu
